content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: fire_charge
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 37}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "jack_o_lantern", "quantity": 57, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft fire_charge, I first need to craft blaze_powder. To do this, I need to place a blaze_rod in the crafting table. I will move the blaze_rod from slot 22 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: fire_charge
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 37}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "jack_o_lantern", "quantity": 57, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have crafted blaze_powder, I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

Ok
